you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave in this episode
1484 a.n today's date is January 29 2018
and the title of the episode is they are
getting ready to pull the plug on the
economy let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we are
getting some information from Wall
Street of all places where many of the
financial pundits they're talking about
this stock market correction and some of
the bigger banks that are directly
connected to the central bank they're
actually foreshadowing a correction
coming very very soon now we know Steve
manoosh n' sent out the signal saying
that we're working towards a weak dollar
now he's a goldman sachs boy and we
understand that the Goldman Sachs JP
Morgan and the rest they're all
intertwined into the central bank system
and again they're not gonna lose out
when the market comes down they're going
to actually make a lot of money because
they're gonna short the market they know
exactly when it does come down but
what's very interesting about all this
and we'll talk about this in a little
bit they're putting out breadcrumbs
saying that the market is right for a
correction we see one coming very very
soon and there's definitely going to be
one there's like no ifs ands or buts
about it and we'll go through what other
individuals have been saying and they're
also talking about the yield curve if we
hit this certain indicator point that
means things are starting to things are
going to start to fall apart and we're
starting to see that already but if we
look at the real economy and this is the
people's economy I'm not talking about
the stock market and yes the stock
market does play a role in the economy
that is like the flare that goes up into
the sky to let everyone know the economy
is collapsing it's done because then the
corporation's at that point can say well
the market came down things are
collapsing it gives them permission to
start laying off people in Mass starting
to sell some of their assets
restructuring everything
and this is when everything starts to
really fall apart and the domino effect
starts to take hold here and things just
really get out of hand
but we see already that the retail
market is a complete and utter disaster
toys-r-us right now they won't even
release their holiday sales this is the
first time in more than a decade and we
know they're bankrupt and they're very
nervous about releasing these because
it's probably absolutely awful we see
the American savings rate well it
continued in December where it mana
sleep pushed up around 0.4% month on
month but we can see overall right now
the US savings rate hit a crisis low and
credit card debt is at a crisis high and
when we look at the overall savings of
the American people we're at the lowest
level since September of 2005 even we
are now even below that point of 2008
9:10 coming out of the financial crisis
which tells us there is definitely
something wrong here now what we're
seeing is that things are coming down
around some of the bankers and I believe
they're doing this to say yeah these are
the people that have been manipulating
goal but everything else is absolutely
fine there's no other problems because
as we can see over the many many years
people have been reporting it Gann has
been out there and they're saying that
yes the precious metal market has been
manipulated by paper contracts and
things like that and people are starting
to dig into this and what they've come
up with is that there are six traders
who were just arrested for manipulating
the gold market now currently or
formerly employed by UBS HSBC Deutsche
Bank no JP Morgan was not named they
were not touched but I think what's
happening right now is they're saying
listen these are the banks and
individuals that were manipulating gold
it wasn't JPMorgan Chase it wasn't
goldman sachs it wasn't the central
bankers it wasn't any of these
individuals so
basically they're off the hook we know
HSBC they were dealing in money
laundering UBS Deutsche Bank they've
been all fine like 30 million 15 million
dollars which is absolutely ridiculous
because we know that the central bank
system we know that they have been
orchestrating the entire manipulation of
the precious metals market using the
paper contracts to drive the price down
and they're trying to do the same thing
with Bitcoin and the crypto markets
they're trying to take control this is
what the central bankers really like
they like control of the market they
like control of the economy and they
like to steer the economy and everything
else in the direction they want it to go
now we see that the NAFTA talks well
they're kind of starting to break down
now of course when it all started out
this is gonna be great we're gonna
renegotiate NAFTA and everything will be
fantastic actually what Trump party
really wanted to do was get rid of it
but you know the way the law was passed
you had to go through Congress and it
wasn't just like flipping a switch like
TPP saying yeah that's off the drawing
board right now we're not going with the
TPP whatsoever this was a little bit
tougher so they he allowed them to go in
and to negotiate NAFTA and lately Trump
has been coming out there saying that
you know NAFTA we should just get rid of
it and I think this is where it is all
headed and I think this is where he
wanted to go and I think those behind
him the Patriots they don't want NAFTA
NAFTA did not help trade here in the
United States didn't bring drops unites
actually we lost about 800,000 jobs with
NAFTA and right now we can see that the
talks are breaking down NAFTA countries
won't be issuing a joint statement after
after the Montreal round of talks and
this is a clear sign that negotiations
are hardly progressing in a favorable
cooperative manner and we see that
things are really going south now and
this is probably all for the best that
they don't work out that they can't come
up with any type of you know negotiation
decision on what NAFTA should be and
it'd be better off if we just got rid of
it altogether we see right now there are
certain individual
that made predictions about the u.s.
bond yields if they are up above two
point six five percent or 2.63 percent
or 2.75 percent they all have their own
predictions it means that things are
gonna start breaking down now what's
very interesting is Jeff good luck and
we mentioned him before he warned that
if the ten year goes to 2.63 percent
stocks will be negatively impacted and
we already see that it's around two
point seven zero eight five JP Morgan
was saying that if it hits two point
seven five that's when things start to
break down and we are around that area
and we can see that all these different
banking systems Goldman Bank of America
JP Morgan and the rest they're all
saying that we are due for a correction
and it will probably hit in the next
three months and we can see right now
they are doing this on purpose I believe
what they're trying to do is they're
trying to push a correction in the
system they want this they want the
economy to start to come down they want
to turn this towards Trump to blame him
and I believe they're moving in this
direction and we can see right now
they're ready to pull the plug on the
economy we already see the economy
starting to break down very very quickly
and they know this and I think what
Trump wants to do is he wants to take a
hold of the narrative and switch it
around and actually blame it on the
central bank on the banking system on
this entire system that has been one
gigantic illusion from the very very
beginning we could see already up in
Canada the real estate prices well they
were the fastest rising in the world
well all of a sudden they are now the
fastest declining prices in the world
and we see that prices are coming down
very very quickly there and we
saw this happen here in the United
States back prior to 2008 where all of a
sudden the prices of homes were going up
and up and up they hit a plateau and all
of a sudden things started to drop very
very rapidly traffic started to dry up
and Canada is now seeing the same exact
thing yes prices are still high there
but it's dropping dramatically and this
is not a good sign because this is going
to lead to a chain reaction which is
going to start to hit all the different
economies around the world and we could
see right now that retail is not doing
well housing is not doing well and the
corporate media is out there they're on
the same page of well the economy's not
doing that well housing doesn't look
like it's doing that well anymore and
I'm starting to see all these just this
different articles all around now
starting to show that the economy
slowing it's not doing well and it looks
like they're starting to build up to the
economy completely coming down and we
can see already but from the wall street
people this is what they're trying to
push right now manoosh in' with his weak
dollar he was trying to do this this is
a signal to everyone that this system is
coming down and of course Trump has been
pushing the system up and up and up he
has full control over it he has control
over a year and what they're trying to
do is they're trying to push the idea
that the economy has come down and it's
because of everything that he's done you
can see what the deep state the cabal
they're doing right now they're pushing
the propaganda trying every type of
trick tactic everything they're trying
to do but once again they're failing and
the only thing they have left well is
some type of an event and collapsing the
economy and they know the scent and we
and we know I should say the central
banks they have control of pumping in
millions and millions of dollars into
the stock market if they turn that off
it doesn't matter what the plunge
Protection Team does it doesn't matter
with all the manipulation with pushing a
button it's going to be very difficult
to push this market back
and the central banks the bankers they
know this they know how to bring a
system down and I can see right now that
they're becoming very desperate they're
watching what is happening out in the
world and they realize what is happening
here in the US and they're just they
have their finger on the button when it
gets close to what they think is very
damaging to themselves to others all
within this organization they are going
to hit the button and bring the economy
down no question about it you can see
everything setting up because if they
don't and they don't control it the
economy is going to come down on its own
the economy is breaking apart we are
already seeing signs in Canada things
are falling apart there we see signs
here in the United States with retail
and everything else it's a complete and
utter disaster yes they can keep the
illusion alive they can tell you
everything is great they can make it
look like everything is great but the
proof is in the pudding it has to do
with the people the people know when
things aren't going well all those
people that are going to be losing their
jobs and retail a hundred thousand
people they know there's a problem
because now they're going to try to find
a different job corporations that are
laying off they know those people know
how hard it is to get another job or a
job at the same pay or even higher so
everyone realizes what's going on
Trump definitely knows what's going on
and the central bankers definitely know
what's going on most of the country they
don't even realize what's happening
right now that the economy is on the
edge of completely breaking apart and
coming down and when it does it's it's
gonna be pretty bad depending on how
this is done I mean if the central
bankers do it they don't care they're
gonna bring it hard it's gonna come down
fast and they don't even care how many
people get wiped out makes no difference
to them they could care less about that
we saw it back in 2008 we saw it back in
1929 and all the other times we had
recessions if
Trump gained gains control of the entire
system brings it down prepares us for
the transition into a new system it's
not gonna be as bad not as many people
are gonna be hurt but there are gonna be
people they're gonna get hurt because
there's no way around that but what he's
trying to do right now he's trying to
set America up so it could survive and
transition into a new system a new
currency a new type of country with
manufacturing maybe not the
manufacturing that we saw you know a
decade ago or two decades ago or three
decades ago but we can see that we need
to move in a completely different
direction trade might not be the same
the currency that we have today most
likely will not be the same things are
about to change just like it did in
Russia when they went through their

and then everything was rebuilt again
and their system changed the country was
ripped apart different countries were

it's a fight to the finish line
listen everyone thanks a lot for
